t: BATS tests for template generation pipeline
built: generate-agent-all-combos.bats: 33 tests covering 27 role+dept combos, GENERATED marker, role sections, overlay substitution, dept prefix correctness, validation edge cases
regenerate-agents.bats: 19 tests covering --help, --dry-run, --check, --force modes plus staleness detection (hash creation, determinism, template/overlay change detection, MISSING report)
template-hooks.bats: 14 skip-aware tests for template-generate-hook.sh and template-staleness-check.sh (DXP-01 graceful degradation)
sg: Consider adding a BATS test that verifies generated agent file content matches --dry-run output for all 27 combos
Add performance benchmark test measuring generation time for all 27 agents
